banner.presentation: Currently a developer analyst at ITS4U, I enjoy exploring new technologies and adapting to their evolution to continuously improve. Currently on assignment at BIL, I am developing skills in software analysis and design, while also refining my expertise in Java and Spring Boot, allowing me to tackle complex projects efficiently. I value teamwork highly and enjoy growing alongside my colleagues. I am confident that my skills and enthusiasm for IT will enable me to contribute meaningfully to innovative and exciting projects.
